content: these handmade crochet earrings will be a distinctive accessory in your jewelry box stitched in aunt lydia s crochet thread classic 10 these popular 3d earrings feature a pretty rose motif delicately created using chain single_crochet double_crochet and more they re lightweight and lovely so make them in different colors to match all your hot summer looks materials aunt lydia s® crochet thread classic™ 10 colors 300 yds/274 32 m contrast a orchid pink 0401 1 ball contrast b maize 0423 1 ball measurement approx 1½ 4 cm diameter excluding earring wire
